channel.title: Agility course

item.title: Agility course
item.dc:creator: @Fender94 Fender94
item.description:
@Fender94 wrote:

I’m having a problem with an agility course I’m working on, the rope swing wont work cuse it’s too far away and I dont know how to fix it.

else if (object == 2282 && objectY < c.absY) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerAgility] >= 50) { c.startAnimation(1762); c.teleportToX = 2551; c.teleportToY = 3549; c.getPA().addSkillXP(EXP[1] * 100, c.playerAgility); gnomeCourse[0] = true; } }

I tried to check if the player’s Y was greater than the object’s but that didn’t work either.

Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
